text: Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao renlei, dang xingfa jianglin tamen zhi ri, bu yi zhe jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yanhuan women yihui'er, women yiding xiangying ni de zhaohuan, yiding fucong shizhemen.”[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nandao nimen yiqian meiyou faguo shi, nimen jue bu hui miewang ma?
